reviews.review_title: Perfect for eczema on the face
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This winter has been aweful for my skin, leaving me with eczema all over my face - around my mouth, sides of my nose, inner and out corners of my eyes, my forehead, temples, hairline and chin/neck area. I used this cream and it worked. It didn't break me out (like other thick eczema creams do), great for watery and sensitive eyes, and was quick to absorb. I also have not seen an eczema cream out there with 5% colloidal oatmeal (most are at 1%) so this stuff is extra strength. My husband also used this on his forehead (he had dry itchy red bumps) and his forehead cleared up quite a bit overnight. I used this morning and night, two pumps each time to also cover my neck, and I could not be happier with the results - the large eczema patch in the middle of my face is gone. And my hair line eczema also calmed down significantly. I still have a few patches here and there but i dont see peeling and dont feel itchiness anymore. I honestly love this product and would buy it regularly, however.... This is quite expensive for a small bottle, and I can't open and use up the remaining product so i feel like there's waste. I also don't like that this is not refillable, though I'm not sure if this is meant for long term use. Also I don't think it's worth using on your body as it will not last a month if used twice a day. Side note: it has a grainy texture which I actually liked. I also liked the subtle scent of the cream, almost like olive oil? Overall, this product is great and I really like the formulation, but the packaging I'm not so sure if it's the best because I cannot open the bottle and scoop up any remaining product.

The old formula was amazing. I appreciate the new packaging because I think this is a bit nicer than the tube but the formula.. why? It worked so well before. This version stings and doesnâ€™t do much else.
